name: Stuck in the Woods
description:
Part 3 of my DevJourney series.

========

I wanted to explore skeletal animations, so I wrote my own animation system and editor. This is the game that came out of it.

I also wanted to challenge myself to make all the game assets myself. The only thing I didn't make myself was the font, everything else was made by me.

The animation system took several months to make. The game itself took about a week.
